enam gini awiyak sahithawa athadanguwata gena siti sakakaruwaku jip rathaye gatagasa sit ekak yata sitina bawa nodath sunil mema siyaluma aparadha sidukaranne game sitina chinthaka bawa sunil pawasimath, ema thorathuru bandhanagaraye siti sakakaru wisin chinthakata pawasimath samanga nithiya rakina sunil saha awanithiya rajakarawana chinthaka samanga gatuma nirmanaya wiya.game samaya apeksha karana minisun mema marayan samanga wairayen pasu wuwath maraya samanga happimata nohaki nisa sunil samanga happa mattu kirima sandaha samawitama sunilta erehiwa chinthakata kelam kimath chinthakata erehiwa sunilta kelam kiyamin kapanna bari atha imbaina nyayen katayuthu karamin thamunta gatha nohaki paliya anun lawa ganimata game samaharun piyawara gena thibuni.kolambaa kauthukagaraye purawasthu horakama, pasugiya sinhala aluth awurudde masmulla pradeshaye sansaranaya wu hora salli, masmulla rajaye rakshithaye hora dawa jawarama, mankollakam yana dewal sidukaranne katayam chinthaka bawatath, ohuge niwasata ibban dama polisiyata alla dena bawata kosthapal sunil pawasana bawata katayam chinthakata paniwuda labadunne game sitina eershyakarayin geni. 2011 bandi wairayata me karunuda ekathuwimen pasuwa nayaku men kopawishtawu katayam chinthaka sunilgen paliganima sandaha pimbaurupath sakas karamin siti awasthawak wiya.mese sitina awasthawe pasugiya nowambar 16 wani dina kosthapal sunilge birinda wana apsara samanmali grama sewaka sammukha parikshanayata peni sita paminima game samahara kanthawanta ange anunu katuwak wiya.
